name: 30 characters and zombies
description:
30 high-quality characters. This asset is perfect for a side scrolling game, or even a turn based RPG type game. However, you can use it however you see fit. All source files are included in the asset. You can easily manipulate them to create new characters.

Here are the most important advantages of vector graphics:

They have “infinite” resolution. They are scalable. They are intuitively created. They are easily manipulated. They are easily reusable. They can be animated. They can be edited with code.

Created in: Adobe Illustrator
Vector: Yes
Layered: Yes
